must_have: I'm not really sure what's important
nice_to_have: In-unit laundry facilities or access to on-site laundry
Proximity to public transportation and major highways
deal_breakers: Proximity to noisy streets or nightclubs

technical: Something with good performance, maybe like a smart system?
I think it should have some kind of energy-saving feature, but I'm not sure what that means.
Possibly a cool techy aspect, like having a wifi-enabled fridge?
non_technical: It should feel inviting and cozy, whatever that means.
I heard that having a good view is important, but I don't really know why.
Something unique, perhaps? Not really sure what that entails.

must_meet: It should look modern, whatever that means.
The overall quality should be decent, but I'm not sure what 'decent' means in this context.
should_meet: It would be great if it had some amenities, but I can't define which.
I think being close to something essential is important, but I don't know what.
nice_to_meet: Access to public transport is nice, but I don't really ride it often.
Having laundry options would be nice... if I decide to do laundry.
